briefdescription.para: Function that allow to connect WiFi.

detaileddescription.para:
Name
SSID of the access point.
Password
Password of the access point.
Xila.Success if it succed to connect, and Xila.Error if not.
Function that that try to connect to the given access point, and if succed, save credential into network registry.

briefdescription.para: Function handle deep-sleep wakeup, initialize the core, start software etc.

detaileddescription.para:
Software_Package
Software that Xila need to load.
Function steps : 1) Check if the wakeup reasing is linked to a power button press, or undefined (power reset) and if not, go to sleep. 2) Create an interrupt for the power button. 3) Initalize display. 4) Initalize system drive. 5) Load registries (display, sound, keyboard, network, time). 6) Play sound and animation. 7) Load software handles. 8) Execute software startup function (Shell and other software).
